hero__title.en: A student who surpassed the teacher

hero__description.uz: Men Bekzod, 13 yoshdaman. Dasturlashga qiziqaman va hozirda Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, va React PWA bilan ishlayman. Asosan authentication va authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token) kabi xavfsizlik tizimlari ustida ishlayman. Doim yangi texnologiyalarni o‘rganishga intilaman va loyihalarimni takomillashtirishga harakat qilaman.
hero__description.ru: Меня зовут Бекзод, мне 13 лет. Я увлекаюсь программированием и сейчас работаю с Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL и React PWA. В основном занимаюсь системами аутентификации и авторизации (JWT, access token, refresh token). Стремлюсь изучать новые технологии и совершенствовать свои проекты.
hero__description.en: My name is Bekzod, I am 13 years old. I’m passionate about programming and currently work with Node.js (Express), PostgreSQL, and React PWA. I mainly focus on security systems such as authentication and authorization (JWT, access token, refresh token). I always strive to learn new technologies and improve my projects.

form__goal.en: Which profession are you aiming for?
